name: AdditionalEvaluationForDepressionAdult
title: Additional evaluation for depression - adult
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent interventions and procedures where an adult patient received additional evaluation to determine the presence of depression.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Intervention or Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with psychiatric interview and evaluation for testamentary capacity, rehabilitation, criminal responsibility, bipolar disorder and mental status.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Psychiatric evaluation of patient for testimentary capacity with report (procedure)
Evaluation of psychosocial impact on plan of care (procedure)
Psychiatric evaluation of patient for criminal responsibility with report (procedure)
Initial psychiatric interview with mental status and evaluation (procedure)
Evaluation of psychiatric state of patient (procedure)
